Mules w/Ribbon (Orange & Yellow Ribbon, Women)
kDesc
Thick-soled mules with orange straps and attention-grabbing yellow ribbons. [#Legal]
Des mules à semelle épaisse, brides orange et nœuds jaunes qui attirent l'attention. [#Legal]
Strand-Schlappen mit orangefarbenen Riemen, dicken Sohlen und Aufsehen erregenden gelben Schleifen. [#Legal]
Sandali con zeppa alta, cinghie arancioni e vistosi fiocchi gialli. [#Legal]
Unas sandalias de plataforma con correas naranjas y unos llamativos lazos amarillos. [#Legal]
黄色のリボンが目を引く、厚底のオレンジのストラップミュール。[#Legal]
노란색의 리본이 눈길을 끄는, 오렌지색 스트랩의 통굽 뮬.[#Legal]
Thick-soled mules with orange straps and attention-grabbing yellow ribbons. [#Legal]
厚底的橙色有帶無後跟拖鞋，附有奪目的黃色蝴蝶結。[#Legal]
